lead_paragraph: Revenge is an overused term when it comes to describing a player’s motivations against a former team. But the Ravens’ Willis McGahee will probably be running a bit harder today in an attempt to prove that the Bills were wrong to give up on him.
snippet: Revenge is an overused term when it comes to describing a player’s motivations against a former team. But the Ravens’ Willis McGahee will probably be running a bit harder today in an attempt to prove that the Bills were wrong to give up on him.
